Experiment Method.Assay Method: Phospholipid Binding Assay and Filament Assembly Analysis

Material used.Description: Experiments compared wild-type and E46K mutant alpha-synuclein proteins.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased phospholipid binding and filament assembly
Readout description.Result Description: E46K mutant showed increased phospholipid binding and filament assembly rates compared to wild-type. Filaments exhibited distinct morphology (e.g., shorter, more branched).

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Standard for normal phospholipid binding and filament assembly rates (context-dependent).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant deviation from wild-type binding/assembly rates (context-dependent).
